description:
No cold fingers on pow days. Windproof, waterproof insulated gloves keep hands toasty and dry whether you're riding the chair, bombing down black diamonds or breaking trail in the backcountry. Redesigned with updated trims, an elevated lining, and more insulation so you’re ready for whatever mother nature throws your way.

  • Durable recycled polyester shell with a DryVent™ insert for water- and windproof protection
  • Synthetic leather palm has Etip™ touchscreen-compatible sections
  • 250g Heatseeker Eco synthetic insulation on back of hand, 160g on palm
  • Heavyweight fleece lining is soft against the skin and adds warmth
  • Articulated design keeps hands in their natural position
  • Full gauntlet keeps out snow
name: The North Face Montana Ski Gloves - Men's
